ComicInfo.Penciller: John Severin,Charlie Rodrigues,John Severin,Vic Martin,Jack Davis,Bill Ward
ComicInfo.Inker: John Severin,Charlie Rodrigues,John Severin,Vic Martin,Jack Davis,Bill Ward
ComicInfo.Title: Flight 407; Take the Giant Clod Test; Get Out the Vote!; Famous Scenes from Great Football Movies; It All Depends Upon the Point of View; If the Comics Were Drawn By Famous Movie Directors; Caught in Traffic; Do-It-Yourself Cartoons; Banks Unlimited or (Money Does Grow on Trees); The Martian Report on Earth; Super Fan Elan
ComicInfo.Summary:
Different people's perspectives on TV westerns, dentists, a defendant in court, a taxi ride, trading stamps and Sophia Loren.
The comic strip 'Blondie' is retold in the stylings of Alfred Hitchcock, Federico Fellini, Ingmar Bergman, Pietro Germi, Cecil B. De Mille, French new wave directors, Russian directors and Akira Kurosawa.
